page.title: 16Media in Brafferton
page.content:
One very recent development has been the publication of the first edition of the{Brafferton {and Coatham Mundeville Newsletter.
It is intended that the publication should take place{quarterly}in an effort to improve communications within the district and at the same time give residents an opportunity to air their views and stimulate comment.
The{first edition}contained details of the Summer Fete, information on the Village Hall Association as well as a number of classified advertisements. There was also advanced notice of the formation of a{computer club}open to the interested of all ages. The first meeting is planned for September.
